resources.string: The exercises in this app are designed in consultation with Dr. Steven Handler, a sports medicine chiropractor. It\'s purpose is to help preserve developers\' physical posture while remaining optimally productive.

Disclaimer: This app is for entertainment purposes only and is not intended to be taken as serious medical advice. We strongly urge you to visit your health care provider for any discomfort or medical conditions you may be experiencing.
This app will notify you when it\'s time for you to do a series of short exercises. Don\'t worry, we will guide you through the exercises.
Please select your preferred time frequency below:
Please select which exercise focus you would like to take for this session.
This is a description of how to do this particular exercise. You should do it this way, and avoid injury.
